about_guide_body:
Hello dear travelers,
My name is Ali. I am a professional tour guide in Tunisia, holder of a professional card issued by the Tunisian Ministry of Tourism, and I have been guiding all over the country for more than 25 years.
Being constantly on the ground and in direct contact with visitors, I noticed a profound change in travelers‚Äô behavior in Tunisia: expectations and habits have evolved. Today, people want tailor‚Äëmade experiences; they want to discover the real Tunisia, meet locals and see their daily life, without missing the wealth and beauty this land offers.
In short, today‚Äôs traveler seeks unforgettable experiences while avoiding the inconveniences of mass tourism.
I decided to take the initiative and create this space so travelers from all over the world can contact me to shape your dream trip and meet all your expectations. Whether you travel solo, as a couple, with family or as a group ‚Äî you are in the right place. I put at your disposal my network and know‚Äëhow.
We offer a journey through time across Tunisia‚Äôs rich history: from Berber heritage to contemporary Tunisia, including Punic, Roman, Byzantine, Arab, Andalusian and Turkish legacies ‚Äî a blend of civilizations and cultures that shaped today‚Äôs Tunisia.
We will take you deep into the Sahara to discover unique, otherworldly landscapes; the desert offers an unforgettable, almost spiritual journey.
All excursions are organized legally with programs validated by the National Tourism Office; all guides are licensed with professional cards, and transport is provided by insured, comfortable tourist vehicles.
You have complete freedom in choosing your type of accommodation while leaving the tours and circuits to us ‚Äî or you can entrust us with the entire planning. We are here to assist and advise you.
Here you will find excursions and circuits to inspire you to create your own itinerary. We will confirm feasibility, of course. Do not hesitate to contact us and get your free quote.
circuits_intro_body: On this tour, you‚Äôll explore the treasures of Islamic heritage in Kairouan ‚Äî the fourth holiest city ‚Äî including the Great Mosque, the first in North Africa, and the Andalusian-Arab architecture of the Mausoleum of Sidi Sahib (the Barber). Then journey to southern Tunisia for unique desert experiences: mountain oases, rolling sands, and the shimmering salt flats of Chott el Jerid. Cross dunes by 4x4 to the iconic Star Wars set, and feel the calm of Nefta‚Äôs palm groves and the charm of Tozeur. Continue to Douz, the ‚Äúgateway to the Sahara,‚Äù for a camel ride at sunset or a quad adventure. Discover Berber heritage in Matmata‚Äôs troglodyte homes carved into the hills, and end with Roman history at El Jem ‚Äî the world‚Äôs third-largest amphitheatre.
